text: 🚨The Ukraine invasion and the energy crisis: Comparative advantages in equity valuations🚨💡Did you know that developments in the energy market have had a significant impact on Europe, particularly due to its heavy dependence on energy imports from Russia? 🤔💰But did you know that firms' energy exposure has had a negative effect on equity returns in Europe? 📉 A one standard deviation increase in energy exposure is associated with a 0.9 percentage point reduction in European firms' returns! 💸🔍Check out the time-varying evidence in Figure 2 of the study by Ferriani and Gazzani (2023b) to see the impact of energy exposure on cumulated daily equity return over the period 05/10/2021-30/04/2023. 📊💬So, what does this mean for investors? It's important to consider the energy exposure of firms in your portfolio and how it may impact their equity returns, especially in times of crisis! 💡#EnergyCrisis
